room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: A group of 8 did the Island Escape. It was beyond what I expected. It was challenging yet so much fun. Working together to solve the clues made this experience that much better. I haven't laughed so hard in a long time. A must do if you are looking to have fun and try out your clue solving skills.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: We did the Island Escape room for a party and it was lots of fun. The room was great and our gamemaster was helpful when we needed her to be. The room was in pretty nice condition and I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a fun activity to do for a decent price

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: This was a real nice family outing. Testing communication and listening skills.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: This was a GREAT time! We really enjoyed the Island Escape game and our game master, Courtney was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Dayton in Dayton
review: Amazing!! Didn't know what to expect. We played Island Escape and loved every minute. This place was the highlight of my visit to Dayton.
